reporter_caption.center: IN RE ACCESS TO JUSTICE COMMISSION, 2011 Ark. 386

caption.center: IN RE ACCESS TO JUSTICE COMMISSION

opinion.opinion_text: Honorable Annabelle Imber Tuck is reappointed to the Access to Justice Commission for a three-year term to expire on October 15, 2014. We thank her for her dedicated service to the Commission.Page 1
